event.title: "I Love Free Software Day 2025" hosted by Linux User Group, Bozen-Bolzano, Italy

body.p: With I Love Free Software Day around the corner the Bozen-Bolzano Linux User group is organising an I Love Free Software Day celebration to remember. It will be fun and everybody is welcome to join us in celebrating our love for Free Software. Step by and let Free Software contributors know how grateful you are for their work.

p.strong: Where: Spazio77, via Dalmazia 77 - Dalmatienstraße 77 - Bozen-Bolzano - Italy

body.p: We look forward to seeing many of you on the 10th of February for our pre-celebrations ♥ ♥ ♥ !
